Brookhaven.Atlanta Silverbacks Park: Atlanta Silverbacks Park is a soccer complex in unincorporated DeKalb County just outside Atlanta. It was the home venue of the Atlanta Silverbacks club, which included the Silverbacks North American Soccer League team and the Atlanta Silverbacks Women of the W-League; it is also the home of the Atlanta Renegades of USA Rugby and the Atlanta Rhinos of USA Rugby League. The park includes a 5,000-seat soccer-specific stadium, which opened in 2006 and is designed for future expansion.
